title: New Business Location
name: new-business-location
description: As a Cafe, Restaurant or Bar, I am looking for commercial space in the City of Melbourne where I can open a new venue or extend my existing venue.

title: Parking Availability
name: parking-availability
description: As a business that requires parking being available to either you or your customers, this will give you a great introduction to how a local business was able to solve their parking problems.

title: PDA for Target Locations
name: pda-target-locations
description: Businesses such as potential restaurant owners want to explore and compare foot traffic at locations they are interested in and compare their recent daily pedestrian volume at different times and different days of the week. Relying on this information, they can choose the best area to place their business workplace.
